plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take a picture and share it with your friends.
plugins.mediaLibraryPermission: The app accesses your media library to let you share your pictures with your friends.
plugins.cameraRollPermission: The app accesses your camera roll to let you share your pictures with your friends.
plugins.saveToCameraRollPermission: The app accesses your camera roll to let you save your pictures.
plugins.accessPrivileges: The app accesses your photos and camera to let you share your pictures with your friends.
